Aliso_Viejo.Galivan, California: Galivan is a location in Orange County, California. Most internet-based mapping websites locate Galivan as a neighborhood or small locale near the cities of Mission Viejo and Laguna Niguel, about two miles north of the Interstate 5-California 73 interchange. A California, 1960, State Highway Map, Department of Public works, Division of Highways shows Galivan 5 miles North of highway 74.
